org.apache.giraph.aggregators

类 TextAggregatorWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.conf.DefaultImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable
      • org.apache.giraph.aggregators.TextAggregatorWriter
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    AggregatorWriter, ImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable

    public class TextAggregatorWriter
extends DefaultImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable
implements AggregatorWriter
    Default implementation of AggregatorWriter. Each line consists of text and contains the aggregator name, the aggregator value and the aggregator class.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static int ALWAYS
      Signal for "write values in every superstep" frequency
      static int AT_THE_END
      Signal for "write only the final values" frequency
      static String FILENAME
      The filename of the outputfile
      static String FREQUENCY
      The frequency of writing: - NEVER: never write, files aren't created at all - AT_THE_END: aggregators are written only when the computation is over - int: i.e. 1 is every superstep, 2 every two supersteps and so on
      static int NEVER
      Signal for "never write" frequency
      protected org.apache.hadoop.fs.FSDataOutputStream output
      Handle to the outputfile

      • 从接口继承的字段 org.apache.giraph.aggregators.AggregatorWriter

        LAST_SUPERSTEP

    • 字段详细资料

      • FILENAME

        public static final String FILENAME
        The filename of the outputfile
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • NEVER

        public static final int NEVER
        Signal for "never write" frequency
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • AT_THE_END

        public static final int AT_THE_END
        Signal for "write only the final values" frequency
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • ALWAYS

        public static final int ALWAYS
        Signal for "write values in every superstep" frequency
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • FREQUENCY

        public static final String FREQUENCY
        The frequency of writing: - NEVER: never write, files aren't created at all - AT_THE_END: aggregators are written only when the computation is over - int: i.e. 1 is every superstep, 2 every two supersteps and so on
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • output

        protected org.apache.hadoop.fs.FSDataOutputStream output
        Handle to the outputfile

    • 方法详细资料

      • initialize

        public void initialize(org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper.Context context,
              long attempt)
                throws IOException
        从接口复制的说明: AggregatorWriter
        The method is called at the initialization of the AggregatorWriter. More precisely, the aggregatorWriter is initialized each time a new master is elected.
        指定者:
        initialize 在接口中 AggregatorWriter
        参数:
        context - Mapper Context where the master is running on
        attempt - ID of the applicationAttempt, used to disambiguate aggregator writes for different attempts
        抛出:
        IOException

      • writeAggregator

        public void writeAggregator(Iterable<Map.Entry<String,org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>> aggregatorMap,
                   long superstep)
                     throws IOException
        从接口复制的说明: AggregatorWriter
        The method is called at the end of each superstep. The user might decide whether to write the aggregators values for the current superstep. For the last superstep, AggregatorWriter.LAST_SUPERSTEP is passed.
        指定者:
        writeAggregator 在接口中 AggregatorWriter
        参数:
        aggregatorMap - Map from aggregator name to aggregator value
        superstep - Current superstep
        抛出:
        IOException

      • aggregatorToString

        protected String aggregatorToString(String aggregatorName,
                        org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable value,
                        long superstep)
        Implements the way an aggregator is converted into a String. Override this if you want to implement your own text format.
        参数:
        aggregatorName - Name of the aggregator
        value - Value of aggregator
        superstep - Current superstep
        返回:
        The String representation for the aggregator

      • close

        public void close()
           throws IOException
        从接口复制的说明: AggregatorWriter
        The method is called at the end of a successful computation. The method is not called when the job fails and a new master is elected. For this reason it's advised to flush data at the end of AggregatorWriter.writeAggregator(Iterable, long).
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 AggregatorWriter
        抛出:
        IOException
